column4: I kinda hope this is the place to ask, but i'm useing X-Chat on ubuntu. The question is then, how to i change my char set in X-Chat? my charset in ubuntu is the right one (ISO-8559-1) but it aint in X-Chat.
gnome listen is complaning about pytgk. anyone?
ofcourse, the first place i looked, and i know it have to be there somewhere, but i just can't find it
